page.title: 12BULLDOGS CHARGE
page.content: Bulldogs is an easy game. The rules are: someone stands in the middle of the road and says either "Bulldogs charge!", "Bulldogs hop!", "Bulldogs skip!", "Bulldogs hop, skip and jump!", or "Bulldogs jump!". There can be as many as 40 players. The person in the middle says one of the things and you have to do it. If you get across safely, you are not on. If you get tugged, you are on. This keeps on going until you have all had a turn at being on, and then you dip to see who is on next game.
